sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas></canvas>
</template>
<script>
  import * as THREE from 'three'
  import * as dat from 'dat.gui'
  import Stats from "three/addons/libs/stats.module";

  const canvas=document.createElement('canvas')
  var stats0 = initStats();

  canvas.width=800;
  canvas.height=800;
  document.body.appendChild(canvas)
  const scene=new THREE.Scene();
  const loader = new THREE.TextureLoader();
  const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({canvas:canvas});

  const pg= new THREE.PlaneBufferGeometry(1000,200, 1, 1);
  const pm = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color: 0xcccccc});
  const p = new THREE.Mesh(pg,pm);
  p.rotation.x=15
  p.rotation.y=0
  p.rotation.z=0
  p.rotation.x=-0.5*Math.PI;
  scene.add(p)


  const cube = new THREE.BoxGeometry(20, 6, 3);
  const texture=loader.load('http://114.55.38.94:8001/picture/wenli2.jpg');
  const material = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({map: texture});
  const cube_object = new THREE.Mesh(cube, material);
  cube_object.position.set(30,50,30)
  cube_object.rotation.set(0,20,0)
  scene.add(cube_object);
  const yuan = new THREE.SphereGeometry(40, 40, 40);
  const texture_2=loader.load('http://114.55.38.94:8001/picture/wenli3.jpg');
  const material_2 = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({map: texture_2});
  const yuan_object= new THREE.Mesh(yuan, material_2);
  yuan_object.position.set(0,50,0)
  scene.add(yuan_object)


  const yuan_2= new THREE.SphereGeometry(4, 4, 4);
  const texture_4=loader.load('http://114.55.38.94:8001/picture/wenli1.jpg');
  const material_4 = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({map: texture_4});
  const yuan_object_2= new THREE.Mesh(yuan_2, material_4);
  yuan_object_2.position.set(20,80,40)
  scene.add(yuan_object_2)
  const yuan_3= new THREE.SphereGeometry(3.5, 3.5, 3.5);
  const yuan_object_3= new THREE.Mesh(yuan_3, material_4);
  yuan_object_3.position.set(60,95,40)
  scene.add(yuan_object_3)


  const yuan_zhui = new THREE.ConeGeometry(10,50,30);
  const texture_3=loader.load('http://114.55.38.94:8001/picture/wenli3.jpg');
  const material_3 = new THREE.MeshLambertMaterial({map: texture_3});
  const yuan_zhui_object= new THREE.Mesh(yuan_zhui, material_3);
  const yuan_zhui_object_2= new THREE.Mesh(yuan_zhui, material_3);
  yuan_zhui_object.position.set(0,50,-70)
  yuan_zhui_object.rotation.set(30,0,0)
  yuan_zhui_object_2.position.set(-75,50,0)
  yuan_zhui_object_2.rotation.set(70,0,0)

  scene.add(yuan_zhui_object);
  scene.add(yuan_zhui_object_2);

  var ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0x0c0c0c,1);
  scene.add(ambientLight);

  var spotLight = new THREE.SpotLight(0xffffff);
  spotLight.position.set(50, 100, 100);
  spotLight.castShadow = true;
  scene.add(spotLight)

  var controls = new function () {
    this.rotationSpeed=0.02
  };

  const gui=new dat.GUI();
  gui.add(controls, 'rotationSpeed', 0, 0.5);

  const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera();
  camera.position.set(200, 200, 200);
  camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
  Render();
  function Render() {
    stats0.update();
    scene.traverse(function (e) {
      if (e instanceof THREE.Mesh && e != p) {
        e.rotation.x += controls.rotationSpeed;
        e.rotation.y += controls.rotationSpeed;
        e.rotation.z += controls.rotationSpeed;
      }
    });
    requestAnimationFrame(render);
    renderer.render(scene, camera);
  }

  function animate() {
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
    renderer.render(scene, camera);
  }
  function initStats() {

    var stats= new Stats();

    stats.setMode(0); // 0: fps, 1: ms

    // Align top-left
    stats.domElement.style.position = 'absolute';
    stats.domElement.style.left = '0px';
    stats.domElement.style.top = '0px';

    canvas.appendChild(stats.domElement);

    return stats;
  }



</script>
<style scoped>

</style>
